description:
This is the schema for the ObjectAPI 1.0 specification. 
It is used to validate the ObjectAPI 1.0 specification.

An example of a valid ObjectAPI 1.0 specification is:

```
schema: apigear.module/1.0
name: my.module
version: 1.0
interfaces:
  - name: Counter
    properties:
      - name: value
        type: int
    operations:
      - name: increment
        params:
          - name: value
            type: int
        return: int
      - name: decrement
        params:
          - name: value
            type: int
        return: int
```

description.description: module description. Should be a short description of the module.

enums.description: a list of enumerations, exported by this module

interfaces.description: a list of interfaces, exported by this module

meta.description: meta information are read by the individual template. Read the template manual which meta tags are supported.

name.description: module name, should be a valid module identifier, starting with a letter, followed by letters, numbers and dot.

schema.description: The ApiGear ObjectAPI specification version of this document.

structs.description: a list of data structures, exported by this module

version.description: module version, should be a major and minor, patch version, separated by a dot.
